channel.title: About on Ryan Faulhaber
channel.description: Recent content in About on Ryan Faulhaber

item.title: Working with me
item.description: If you are in need of software development work on a contractual, part time basis (that is, you don’t mind me working in the evenings!), please get in touch. I’m familiar with a wide variety of languages, frameworks, tools, and platforms. If there’s something I don’t know, I trust that I can figure it out quickly. My experience, as stated partially above, includes: Web development (JavaScript, React) Mobile development (Android with Java and Kotlin, React Native) Development on Amazon Web Services (especially AppSync, DynamoDB, RDS, EC2, ECS) I am AWS certified.
